name: Zelda 1k
description:
Link my boy. What happened? How did you end up in my Underworld? You got sloppy! I see your spirit is still strong. However, you cannot return so easily. You must prove your worthiness to return back to the living by battling in my dungeon and winning back a heart. Do this and continue your journey to end Ganon's tyranny. Fail and you shall wander the Aether forever in the darkness as a disgraced soldier.

This was a game made within the 1024 character limit for the Pico-8 1k Jam
